ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Escape From Junk Rat Island Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary:
Chris is missing and it’s up to the Bravest Warriors to save their good friend and kind of leader. Will the Bravest Warriors be able to save Chris from the slug people even though they’re one member short? And what nefarious purpose could they have for the team’s residential Emotion Lord? Join Danny, Beth, and Wallow as they try to get to the bottom of this and save their friend.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tara Helfer | 1 | B | Cover B | Renata Latipova | 2 | C | Cover C | Drew Green | 3 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Cameron Chittock, Rebecca Taylor, Shannon Watters, Whitney Leopard
ComicInfo.Characters: Beth Tezuka, Catbug, Chris Kirkman, Danny Vasquez, Impossibear, Plum, Robo Chris, Wallow
